text_block_list.name: Saint Lite
text_block_list.text:
Its rise was always met
with unbridled passion.

text_block_list.name: Saint Lite
text_block_list.text:
It was a time when racing
found its glory and pride.

text_block_list.name: Speed Symboli
text_block_list.text:
We challenged the world,
only to find a vast gulf between us.

text_block_list.name: Speed Symboli
text_block_list.text:
So we looked to the future and
rose to the challenge that day.

text_block_list.name: Haiseiko
text_block_list.text:
What began as entertainment for
a few grew into a national sensation.

text_block_list.name: Haiseiko
text_block_list.text:
The day Japan itself was
swept away by racing fever.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: But now that love has faded into the past.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
The fervor has cooled into slumber and
only a gentle breeze drifts across the turf.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
Will racing end here?
Will "that day" never return?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Let our cheers paint the turf anew,
greater than ever before.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Together we will set the
Twinkle Series ablaze.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: A legend to be passed down forever.
